statements: SELECT * FROM MembershipDetails;
SELECT membership_id, member_name, join_date FROM MembershipDetails WHERE membership_type = 'Premium';
SELECT member_name, renewal_date FROM MembershipDetails WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MembershipDetails ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT membership_id, renewal_date FROM MembershipDetails WHERE membership_type = 'Basic' ORDER BY join_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MembershipDetails WHERE membership_type = 'Gold';
SELECT member_name, membership_type FROM MembershipDetails WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT membership_id, member_name, renewal_date FROM MembershipDetails WHERE renewal_date < '2023-05-01' ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MembershipDetails WHERE membership_type = 'Silver' AND join_date > '2021-10-01' ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_members, membership_type FROM MembershipDetails GROUP BY membership_type HAVING total_members > 5 ORDER BY total_members DESC;
SELECT * FROM membership_details
SELECT full_name, email FROM membership_details
SELECT member_id, full_name, email, membership_type FROM membership_details WHERE member_id = 1
SELECT * FROM renewal_details ORDER BY renewal_date DESC
SELECT member_id, renewal_date, amount_paid FROM renewal_details WHERE amount_paid > 0
SELECT * FROM membership_details WHERE membership_type = 'Premium' ORDER BY full_name DESC, member_id ASC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM membership_details WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' AND member_id IN (1, 5, 10) ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT membership_type, COUNT(*) AS total_members FROM membership_details GROUP BY membership_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_members DESC;
SELECT m.full_name, r.renewal_date, r.amount_paid FROM membership_details m JOIN renewal_details r ON m.member_id = r.member_id WHERE r.amount_paid > 1000 ORDER BY r.renewal_date DESC;

SELECT m.full_name, r.renewal_date, r.amount_paid FROM membership_details m LEFT JOIN renewal_details r ON m.member_id = r.member_id WHERE r.renewal_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY m.full_name ASC, r.renewal_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MembershipDetails;
SELECT full_name, email FROM MembershipDetails WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT renewal_date, renewal_amount FROM MembershipRenewals ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT manager_name, department FROM MembershipManagement WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_id, full_name, email, phone_number, address FROM MembershipDetails WHERE member_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM MembershipDetails WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM MembershipDetails WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT member_id, full_name, email FROM MembershipDetails ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT m.manager_id, m.manager_name, m.department, r.renewal_date FROM MembershipManagement m JOIN MembershipRenewals r ON m.manager_id = r.member_id;
SELECT * FROM MembershipRenewals WHERE renewal_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT name, email FROM members WHERE date_joined >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_id, membership_type FROM memberships ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM renewals WHERE renewal_amount > 100;
SELECT name, payment_amount FROM members JOIN payments ON members.id = payments.member_id;
SELECT id, name, email FROM members WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM memberships WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT member_id, renewal_date, renewal_amount FROM renewals ORDER BY renewal_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 AND payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT name, date_joined FROM members WHERE date_joined BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM memberships;
SELECT member_name, member_email, membership_type FROM memberships WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, member_name, end_date FROM memberships WHERE membership_type = 'Premium' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT id, member_name, start_date, end_date FROM memberships WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT member_name, member_email, membership_type, start_date, end_date FROM memberships WHERE membership_type IN ('Standard', 'Premium') ORDER BY member_name ASC, start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM memberships WHERE membership_type = 'Premium';
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM memberships WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT member_name, end_date FROM memberships ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, amount FROM memberships JOIN member_transactions ON memberships.id = member_transactions.membership_id WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-07-01';
SELECT member_name, monthly_fee FROM memberships JOIN membership_types ON memberships.membership_type = membership_types.type_name WHERE membership_type = 'Standard';
